description: This extension uses the Roslyn compiler plattform to identify IDisposable-instances that are not disposed. IDisposable instances that are not disposed, usually lead to some hard-to-find errors like memoryleaks. The current version is only able to find this undisposed instances, future version should also provide code-fixes.
summary: This is a small Visual Studio Extension that should identify and fix problems as memleaks while using IDisposables
author: David Störmer
